name: Miabella 1-7/8 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Engagement Ring

reviews.name: Miabella 1-7/8 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Engagement Ring
reviews.reviewText: My fiance actually proposed with another ring which we tried getting re-sized twice and it was not happening so we came online and looked he told me to choose this time and we both chose this one. It looks way more beautiful in person it is thick and fits perfect. We are so happy to have purchased this ring and you can not beat the price the quality is amazing and I mean AMAZING!!
reviews.title: Beautiful Engagement Ring

reviews.name: Miabella 1-7/8 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Engagement Ring
reviews.reviewText: Just got the ring in the mail and was so beyond pleasantly surprised at how gorgeous it is! The photos definitely do not do it justice! The white sapphires are beautiful and so bright and sparkley, they look BETTER than diamonds! :)
reviews.title: LOVE!!!

reviews.name: Miabella 1-7/8 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Engagement Ring
reviews.reviewText: I recently lost my actual first engagement ring at work in a retail store. It was real and I had it for almost 2 years. After losing it most a week ago, I went on the search for a very special and expensive (looking ring). I will be wearing this ring for the next 3 months until we get married. (Perfect replacement!) When looking at the ring really hard, you can tell that it is not a real diamonds "hands down". But the ring actually takes some getting use to, "if you are a girl who is use to the real deal in jewelry." I took quite a few photos wearing the ring, and it looks very amazing and the detail is so beautiful! If someone is looking at the ring from a distance they will be captivated by how expensive it looks. I wore it in the shower and it never slipped off and while washing dishes. The carat in the middle of it is not foggy at all. It looks so romantic and my fiancee loves how realistic it looks. It is worth the buy ladies the photos are not edited in no way possible.
reviews.title: Very Captivating! Totally Impressed!

reviews.name: Miabella 1-7/8 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Engagement Ring
reviews.reviewText: We picked this ring out as a replacement ring for my old one and I LOVE it!! (: have had no problems with it and hasn't turned my finger green like I was afraid it might! The first picture is from the day I got it and the 2nd is from today! (: still just as pretty!!
reviews.title: 21 May 2013

reviews.name: Miabella 1-7/8 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Engagement Ring
reviews.reviewText: I saw this ring and had to have it and the fact that it is a white sapphire is just that more special to me because sapphire is my birthstone, but this is my first white sapphire and I hope to purchase more in the future. Since buying my ring I have had many compliments on it and when I tell people how reasonable it was they can't believe it. I would highly recommend this ring.
reviews.title: 23 February 2013
